effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.x-y: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

flavor_text.x-y: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
